mapper.select: SELECT fc.dnis, fc.user_id, u.login_name, count(*) AS totalCount, sum(fc.length) AS totalTime FROM t_fact_call fc LEFT JOIN t_user u ON fc.user_id = u.id WHERE fc.call_type = #{call_type} AND fc.tenant_id = #{tenant_id} AND fc.start_time > #{start_time} AND fc.end_time < #{end_time} GROUP BY fc.user_id ORDER BY totalCount, totalTime DESC LIMIT #{pageStart} ,#{pageEnd}

SELECT distinct count(*) FROM t_fact_call fc LEFT JOIN t_user u ON fc.user_id = u.id WHERE fc.call_type = #{call_type} AND fc.tenant_id = #{tenant_id} AND fc.start_time > #{start_time} AND fc.end_time < #{end_time}

SELECT t.domain, t.company_name, fc.tenant_id, count(*) AS totalCount, sum(length) AS totalTime FROM t_fact_call fc LEFT JOIN t_tenant t ON fc.tenant_id = t.id WHERE fc.call_type = #{call_type} AND fc.start_time > #{start_time} AND fc.end_time < #{end_time} GROUP BY fc.tenant_id ORDER BY totalCount, totalTime DESC LIMIT #{pageStart} ,#{pageEnd}
